===Etymology===
* [[四海]] ("[[four]] [[seas]]") In Ancient China, it was thought that China was surrounded by ocean on all four sides. Eventually, this phrase came to mean "all four directions" or "[[everywhere]]."
* [[一家]] ("[[one]] [[family]]")
